## PlaneShape class


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class PlaneShape extends Shape 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./decentraland-ecs.planeshape.height.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Sets the vertical length of the plane. Defaults to 1. |
|  [uvs](./decentraland-ecs.planeshape.uvs.md) |  | <code>number[]</code> | Sets the UV coordinates for the plane. Used to map specific pieces of a Material's texture into the plane's geometry. |
|  [width](./decentraland-ecs.planeshape.width.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Sets the horizontal length of the plane. Defaults to 1. |
